choose.otherwise: `id` AS `id`, `user_id` AS `userId`, `coin_id` AS `coinId`, `type` AS `type`, `pricing_mode` AS `pricingMode`, `floating_ratio` AS `floatingRatio`, `price` AS `price`, `hide_price` AS `hidePrice`, `min_limit` AS `minLimit`, `max_limit` AS `maxLimit`, `already_transaction_amount` AS `alreadyTransactionAmount`, `balance_amount` AS `balanceAmount`, `freeze_amount` AS `freezeAmount`, `payment_method_id` AS `paymentMethodId`, `status` AS `status`, `open_opponent_limit` AS `openOpponentLimit`, `certification_level` AS `certificationLevel`, `registered_time` AS `registeredTime`, `payment_time` AS `paymentTime`, `message` AS `message`, `version` AS `version`, `create_time` AS `createTime`, `update_time` AS `updateTime`
